boat.full_description:
Indian Runner is a Cornish Crabber 26. Her first owner sailed her out of Poole and undertook a number of Channel crossings in the first ten years of her life.  In 2022 she was purchased by Christine and Roger Hardman and moved to Hamble in the Solent. She completed the OGA 60 Round Britain event in 2023, and is entered for the Netherlands event in August 2023.

She has a lifting centreboard so is capable of entering shallow creeks and harbours, plus good lead ballast for stability, which was well tested in the Round Britain. Her sail number is 14. She has a distinctive hinged lifting bowsprit, and a maroon sprayhood.
boat.name: Indian Runner
boat.short_description: OGAIndian Runner  is a Cornish Crabber 26, sail No. 14. She is gaff rigged with a fibreglass hull, built in 2011, and took part in the 2023 Round Britain.
